phrases: I have a copy of this, too.
So Yamamoto-san also reads poetry books...
Nana, hurry up and give it!
Then let us hurry up and go already.
The lunch counter's going to get crowded.
What am I going to do...?
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
I am sure Yamamoto-san's upset, since she lost the picture...
I have to get it back to her.
But I cannot find the right time to talk to her...
You also had a copy of it?
Ah... someone just went to throw the trash in the incinerator.
You will not believe what he did!
Let me see your English homework.
You need to do it yourself sometimes, you know.
Ah, I am... getting jealous again...
It is like you have not been able to relax all day.
I guess that is fine, then.
But remember, no secrets between us.
That is not fair... with just one smile, I will let you do whatever you want.
Go ahead and take my homework.
You are going to be called on today, right?
That is why I want him all to myself...
That picture... was not of Yano.
It was picture of Yamamoto-san's sister!
It makes sense for Yamamoto-san to have it.
Did you do the English assignment?
I have got it down pat.
Nana-chan's notebook is only for me.
Is this some sort of harassment?!
W-Was there maybe.. a picture in it?
If you did not see it, do not worry about it.
I gave it back to Yamamoto.
Umm... did Yamamoto-san say anything about it...?
Umm, nothing like where did you find it or anything?
Nana-chan... why did you have that?
He is really mad at me...
Snooping around in other people's things is pretty awful, do not you think?
Nanairo no niji ga koi no yukue shitteru no
Kiseki wa meguru to miageta yozora wa
Kakomare maboshi kumo no ue de odoru
Ikibasho wo sagashita tameiki ga irodzuku
Ushinau sono mae ni furete hashiri
Hanasanaide mou sukoshi dake kowaresou yo
Anata no kao wa shizuka ni
Mi no sono mae no sono hitomi
Kaze ni utau yume no hito
Hohoemu sono tabi ni setsunasa tsumoru
The seven-colored rainbow knows where our love is headed.
As the seasons turn, the night sky I gaze up at
surrounds me, and illusions dance above the clouds.
I tried to find where it led, but it only colored my sighs.
I need to reach out and touch it before it fades away.
The palm of your hand is filled with warmth.
Do not let go just yet.
Everything seems about to fall apart.
As my heart wavers, tears fall from my eyes.
sing in the wind of the one I dream of.
When I am lost, I feel really down, and when I think of it...
Every time you smile, the pain piles up.
Why are you working ten pages ahead?
There is nothing else to do at home.
There is nothing else to do, so you study?
If you hate me that much, we should not have even gotten to know each other to begin with.
You only used me to get revenge on my sister, anyway.
That would not mean anything, and I would have no reason to do that.
Nana, you are not going to buy those clothes you just tried on?
They looked so good on you, too.
Then why did you invite me to go shopping?
Did you have a fight with Yano?
I was not really snooping around...
Yano can be really cold sometimes...
He has not called me, even though it is Sunday...
I went to the same middle school as Yano.
We are at Take's house right now.
Yano's throwing him a birthday party today.
Ah... sure... but I am out shopping with a friend right now...
We will make a whole hook-up party out of this!
By the way, is your friend cute?
Hey, what are you doing with my cell?
I was thinking of making a hook-up party.
You do not have to come.
Have a seat, heave a seat!
That annoyed look was blatantly obvious.
What will you have to drink?
We have everything, since he runs a liquor store.
Why do not you sit next to Yano?
You do not have to hold back.
I am getting kind of tired.
Ah, that little... he is ignoring me!
For being my boyfriend, he is really ruining things!
I thought coming empty-handed might seem rude, so I bought you a present, Takeuchi-kun.
It is nothing special, so, umm...
Was it a bit too corny...?
No... I think I actually kind of like it.
I had a really hard time choosing, so that is great to hear!
Ah... let us try to nonchalantly change the topic...
By the way, it is that, is not it?
It is the season for sea urchins, right?
You did not change the topic one bit!
Keep going with the topic change!
You jealous of the sea urchin?
You are jealous, are not you?
You have had such a bored look on your face this whole time.
I am not jealous at all of that weird strap.
Then why do not you find a different look?
It is my birthday, you know.
Getting such a lame sea urchin like that.
You are just pitiful, getting so happy over it.
Yano... be an adult about this.
What the hell are you doing?!
Throwing away someone is present like that... you are scum!
The world does not revolve around you, Yano!
You do not have to take me home!
The world may not revolve around me...
But what you just did was a mistake.
You cannot do that sort of stuff, Yano.
I do not need anything that will not be mine.
Then, you do not need me...?
There is something wrong with you being unable to believe in people.
Have you ever believed in someone and been betrayed by them?
It is okay if you do not understand.
Did not you throw it out the window...?
But you said it was weird and lame.
Give it to Takeuchi sometime when I am not watching.
Can I ask for something else out of selfishness?
Do not be nice to any other guys when I am around.
Is it okay if you are not looking?
Takahashi, I know you do not want to, but please.
Try to read between the lines here.
The starry sky looks just like the planetarium...
If a shooting star whizzed by, what would you wish for?
I wish to become rich as soon as possible.
Please do not talk about unrealistic dreams.
I would wish to be your first and your last.
Why do you always attach that stuff to what I say?
And you say that pretty easily, but do you know what it really means?
To be together with you until you die.
I swear it on the stars.
If there is a shooting star, I wish to be with Nana-chan forever.
I cannot seem to find the sea urchin anywhere.
I looked for it all night, but I could not find it at all.
Yano only pretended to throw it out.
I should have told you sooner.
No... I am just glad I did not lose it.
Ah, but I will not put it on my cellphone.
He would probably get the wrong idea if I did.
I-I am really sorry about this, and for making you have to do that...
It would be nice if Yano tried taking some pointers from Takeuchi-kun...
You are kind of like my boy cousin.
He is only five, but he always gets in my shirt and hugs me.
He just want to touch me.
When I carry him around, he gets really happy.
And he is only happy if a girl does it.
Even though the three-year-old girl does not do that at all...
So I am the same as a five-year-old brat?
There is nothing to worry about.
I will give you a hug, so why do not you come on over?
As I thought, he really is the same as a five-year-old.
Some girl from school is waiting outside for you.
I wonder if she is here to confess her love?
That kind of pisses me off...
And it kind of looks like he is used to this!
I will be back in a minute!
Do not you want to know...
Taisetsu na anata no hitomi ni
Watashi wa utsutteru no ka na
Waraitai waraitai kokoro no mannaka de
dou demo ii koto mo zenbu
Yde wo kunde asuite ikou Yeah!
Taisetsu na hito tsurete yukun da ne
Kimi wo sagashite kimi wo sagashite
Donna toki demo kimi wo sagashiteiru kedo
Mitsukaru no sore wa kimi na no?
Dore dake no omoi nara dakishimete kureru no?
I wonder if I am reflected
I wonder how I can always be happy
on the windowsill where the sunshine always falls?
I hide my true feelings and the thumping of my heart.
the pain of not being able to understand each other burns.
I want to smile, I want to smile, down to the core of my heart.
I will open up to you
about how I pretend to be strong, about how I am weak,
I will continue to love you forever.
Take my arm and let us walk.
The seasons leave only me behind
and take my precious person away, do not they?
I look for you, I look for you,
I am always looking for you,
but when I find that person, is it really you?
I am so sad, I am so sad,
How much feeling must I give to be able to embrace you?
Ah, I want to smile, I want to smile.
You... have not forgotten about Onee-chan at all.
You betrayed both me and her at the same time.
Everything is going the way you want it to, is not it?
Are you satisfied with yourself now?
I love you, more than anyone else in the world.
That is why, Yano... talk to me.
